name: Dungeon Director
description:
Star in an epic dungeon crawler movie! Plan your actions before playing them out. Be the director of Drake Slayer!

We recommend you play this in fullscreen.

Controls:

Move with W, A, S, D

Attack with X

Play actions with Space

Bear Jams Spring 2021 submission by:

Roope Juponaho (Tturna) and Aarni Junkkala (ArskaWarrior).
